name: Halloween Survival Game
description:
Please go download our new game – Halloween Survival 3D!

Halloween Survival 3D is a hardcore survival with a top down view set in a halloween-styled, three-dimensional environment.

Let’s start our survival adventure! The objective of this game is to collect resources, craft tools, weapons, and shelter, and survive as long as possible.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the left controller to move a character. Use the right button for every attack.

Game features:
+ offline survival game!
+ halloween pictures!
+ fun & addictive gameplay!
+ halloween game!

Let's go party halloween with Halloween Survival 3D! Fight to survive!
